Read FASTA file into R. Install 1st then call library to make use of `read.fasta()` function.

`install.packages("bio3d")`

`library(bio3d)`


```{r}
MSA <- read.fasta("Q5 MultiSeq Alignment.fa")

```



Calculating sequence identity 

```{r}
seqidentity(MSA, normalize=TRUE, similarity=FALSE, ncore=1, nseg.scale=1)
```
